title: Va. man charged in alleged sexual assaults on girl he coached 11 years ago
text:
Sergio Rene Galvez, 47, of Clifton was arrested Tuesday and charged with three counts of taking indecent liberties with a child by a custodian, police said.

Galvez was a coach for USA Gymnastics, the national governing body for the sport reeling after former team physican Larry Nassar abused more than 160 people. Galvez was placed on the organization’s “list of suspended and restricted persons” in 2018 for alleged sexual misconduct violations. He was forced to resign when allegations against him first surfaced, the Associated Press reported.
description: The alleged incidents, from 2007 and 2008, were investigated after an FBI tip.
